segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool is about to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far up, and the stool is wobbling like crazy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn’t she see how dangerous this is?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are splayed out, and he’s balancing on his tiptoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he’s going to crash onto the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this; someone needs to stop him before he gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes is completely clueless about what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like she’s in her own little world while the kids risk their necks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he grabs that cookie fast and gets down before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is the kind of thing that ends with a trip to the emergency room.
segments.speaker: PAR
